# Project Overview

This project uses the [[architecture]] pattern described in our concepts folder.

## References

- See [[migration]] for the database migration plan
- The deployment follows [[blue-green-deployment]] strategy
- Review the [[architecture|system architecture]] for details

## Implementation

The implementation is based on #clean-code principles.

Some `inline code` and a code block:

```python
# This [[should-not-be-extracted]] as a link
def hello():
    pass
```
